TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataMemberConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 提供类型转换器，可从当前组件选定的数据源中检索数据成员的列表。

span.span: Provides a type converter that can retrieve a list of data members from the current component's selected data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供一些方法，可以从设计时组件的当前数据源检索数据成员的列表。 provides methods that can retrieve a list of data members from the current data source of a design-time component. 使用此类型转换器[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]以提供数据的列表中显示属性窗口中的成员的值。This type converter is used by [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)] to provide the values that appear in the list of data members in the Properties window. > [!CAUTION] > 您永远不应直接访问的类型转换器。You should never access a type converter directly. 相反，通过调用适当的转换器。Instead, call the appropriate converter by using . 有关详细信息，请参阅中的示例基类。For more information, see the examples in the base class. 有关类型转换器的详细信息，请参阅基本类和[如何： 实现类型转换器](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2013/ayybcxe5(v=vs.120))。For more information about type converters, see the base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2013/ayybcxe5(v=vs.120)). ## Examples [!code-cpp[DataSourceTypeConverterExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataSourceTypeConverterExamples/CPP/datasourcetypeconverterexamples.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[DataSourceTypeConverterExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataSourceTypeConverterExamples/CS/datasourcetypeconverterexamples.cs#2)] [!code-vb[DataSourceTypeConverterExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataSourceTypeConverterExamples/VB/datasourcetypeconverterexamples.vb#2)]

span.para: 重写此方法以根据转换要求。参数可用于提取有关从中调用此转换器的环境的附加信息。可能会，因此应始终进行检查。此外，属性可能也会返回对象。

Override this method to meet your own conversion requirements. The parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment the converter is being invoked from. It might be , so you should always check. Also, properties of the object might also return .

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection GetStandardValues (System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context);

Public Overrides Function GetStandardValues (context As ITypeDescriptorContext) As TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection

abstract member GetStandardValues : System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext -> System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection override this.GetStandardValues : System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext -> System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection

param.name: context
param.span: 一个 对象，它指示要获取其值的组件或控件。

span.span: An object indicating the component or control to get values for.

summary.span: 如果可以得到有关存在于选定数据源中的数据成员的信息，则获取这些数据成员。

span.span: Gets the data members present within the selected data source, if information about them is available.

returns.span: 一个 ，它列出为组件选定的数据源的数据成员。

span.span: A listing the data members of the data source selected for the component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此转换器使用关联的组件的设计器来检索当前选择的数据源的实现。The converter uses the implementation of the associated component's designer to retrieve the current data source selection.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示从 返回的标准值集合是否为所有可能值的列表。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the collection of standard values returned from is a list of all possible values.

returns.span: 如果从 返回的 是所有可能的有效值的排他列表，则为 ；如果还可能有其他值，则为 。

span.span: if the returned from is an exclusive list of all possible values that are valid; if other values are possible.

returns.span: 当在此类中实现时，此方法始终返回 。

span.span: As implemented in this class, this method always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果该列表是独占的（如在枚举数据类型中），则其他任何值都无效。If the list is exclusive, such as in an enumeration data type, then no other values are valid. 如果该列表不是独占的则有其他有效的值的标准列表值之外提供。If the list is not exclusive, then there are other valid values besides the list of standard values that provides.

span.para: 如果你想要转换的类型支持标准值，重写此方法。 参数可用于提取有关从中调用该转换器的环境的附加信息。可能会，因此应始终进行检查。此外，属性可能也会返回对象。

Override this method if the type you want to convert supports standard values. The parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from. It might be , so you should always check. Also, properties of the object might also return .
